---
title: "Safety Follow-Up & Escalation"
---

## Follow-Up Triggers
- Incomplete SAE documentation
- Missing outcome information
- Unresolved ongoing events
- Recurrent reporting delays

## CRA Escalation Criteria
Escalate when:
- Reporting timelines repeatedly missed
- Site does not respond to safety queries
- Safety processes appear systematically weak
- Subject safety may be compromised

## Documentation
All follow-up actions must be:
- Written
- Dated
- Tracked to resolution
- Filed appropriately
